text: Which of the following locations is allowed to register new permanent residence?

text: In which of the following cases is the language used in the proceedings not Vietnamese?

choices.A: The dispute had a foreign element, the parties could not agree on the language of the proceedings, the Arbitration Council decided to use Vietnamese.
choices.B: The dispute has a foreign element and one of the parties cannot use Vietnamese and the parties agree to use English as the language of proceedings.
choices.C: The dispute does not have a foreign element, one of the parties cannot use Vietnamese.
choices.D: Disputes in which at least one party is a foreign-invested enterprise and the parties agree to use Vietnamese as the language of litigation.

text: What does the permanent residence registration dossier of a citizen with legal residence under his/her ownership include?

choices.A: Declaration of change of residence information; Papers and documents proving sufficient housing area to register permanent residence according to regulations.
choices.B: Declaration of change of residence information; Lease, lending, lodging contract or document on legal lending or lodging that has been notarized or authenticated according to the provisions of law.
choices.C: Declaration of change of residence information; Papers and documents proving ownership of legal residence.
choices.D: Declaration of change of residence information; papers and documents proving personal relationships with household members.

text: In what cases does the arbitrator have authority to resolve disputes?

choices.B: Disputes arise between parties in which at least one party has commercial activities
choices.C: Other disputes between the parties that are prescribed by law are resolved by Arbitration

text: Which of the following is not a prohibited residence act?

choices.B: Exploit information about your residence in the National Population Database.
choices.C: Resolve permanent residence registration or temporary residence registration when it is clear that the person registering permanent residence or temporary residence registration does not live at that place.
choices.D: Falsely declaring conditions, falsifying records, papers and documents to register for permanent residence or temporary residence registration; buy, sell, rent, lease, borrow, lend, mortgage, mortgage, destroy papers and documents on residence.

choices.B: Build a prosperous, progressive, happy family and fully perform its functions.
choices.C: Ban legal education on marriage and family.
choices.D: Mobilize people to eliminate outdated customs and practices regarding marriage and family.

text: Which of the following is not the responsibility of the residence registration agency?

choices.B: Issuing, printing and managing declarations of changes in residence information and papers, documents, forms and books on residence.
choices.C: Update information on citizens' residence in the National Population Database and Residence Database.
choices.D: Manage, store records, papers, documents on registration, residence management and secure information on citizens' residence registration.

text: What are not the obligations and rights of parents who do not directly raise children after divorce?

choices.A:
Respect your child's rights 
to live with 
direct breeder.
choices.B: Child support
choices.C: Abusing visitation to hinder or negatively affect the care, care, upbringing and education of children
choices.D: Visit your child without anyone hindering you.

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

text: What are the conditions for resolving disputes by arbitration?

choices.A: The parties have an arbitration agreement, which may be made before or after a dispute arises.
choices.B: In case a party to the arbitration agreement who is an individual dies or loses legal capacity, the arbitration agreement remains valid for that person's heirs or legal representatives, unless the parties have other agreements.
choices.C: In case a party to the arbitration agreement is an organization that must terminate its operations, go bankrupt, dissolve, consolidate, merge, divide, separate or convert its organizational form, the arbitration agreement will still be effective. power over the organization that takes over the rights and obligations of that organization, unless the parties agree otherwise.
choices.D: All three options above are correct.

text: In arbitration proceedings, how can the parties negotiate and reconcile with each other?

choices.A: The parties have the right to freely negotiate and agree with each other on resolving the dispute, but do not have the right to request the Arbitration Council to mediate so that the parties can agree with each other on resolving the dispute.
choices.B: The parties have the right to freely negotiate and agree with each other on dispute resolution or request the Arbitration Council to mediate so that the parties can agree with each other on dispute resolution.
choices.C: The parties do not have the right to freely negotiate and conciliate with each other, but must request the Arbitration Council to conciliate so that the parties can agree on resolving the dispute.
choices.D: The parties do not have the right to freely negotiate, conciliate or request the Arbitration Council to mediate so that the parties can agree on resolving the dispute.

text: How long does it take for the residence registration agency to evaluate and update household information related to household separation into the Residence Database from the date of receipt of a complete and valid dossier?

choices.A: 05 working days.
choices.B: 05 days including holidays and weekends.
choices.C: 03 working days.
choices.D: 03 days including holidays and weekends.

choices.A: Minor child
choices.B: I am an adult and married
choices.C: The child is an adult but has lost civil act capacity
choices.D: I am unable to work and have no assets to support myself.

text: What are the plants that contain narcotics?

choices.A: Poppy
choices.B: Coconut tree
choices.C: Cacao tree

text: Which of the following is included in the law applicable to dispute resolution as stipulated in the Commercial Arbitration Law?

choices.A: For disputes without foreign elements, the Arbitration Council applies Vietnamese law to resolve the dispute.
choices.B: For disputes with foreign elements, the Arbitration Council applies the law chosen by the parties; If the parties do not have an agreement on the applicable law, the Arbitral Tribunal shall decide to apply the law that the Arbitral Council considers most appropriate.
choices.C: In cases where Vietnamese law or the law chosen by the parties do not have specific provisions related to the content of the dispute, the Arbitration Council may apply international practices to resolve the dispute if the application or consequences The consequences of such application are not contrary to the basic principles of Vietnamese law.
choices.D: All three options above are correct

text: In what cases is the arbitration agreement invalid?

choices.A: Disputes arising in areas not under the jurisdiction of the Arbitrator specified in Article 2 of this Law.
choices.B: The arbitration agreement does not violate legal prohibitions.
choices.C: The form of the arbitration agreement complies with the provisions of Article 16 of this Law.
choices.D: The person who establishes the arbitration agreement is a competent person according to the provisions of law.

text: Is the arbitration agreement independent of the contract?

choices.A: The arbitration agreement is completely independent of the contract. Changing, extending, canceling a contract, invalid or unenforceable contract does not invalidate the arbitration agreement.
choices.B: The arbitration agreement is not completely independent of the contract. Changing or extending the contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.C: The arbitration agreement is not completely independent of the contract. Cancellation of a contract or a void or unenforceable contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.D: The arbitration agreement depends on the contract. Actions to change, extend, cancel the contract or make the contract invalid or unenforceable will invalidate the arbitration agreement.

text: What is defined as a psychotropic substance?

choices.A: Psychotropic substances are nerve stimulants
choices.B: Psychotropic substances are stimulants or depressants or hallucinogens that, if used repeatedly, can lead to addiction in the user.
choices.C: Psychotropic substances are nerve depressants
choices.D: Both the a, b, c are wrong

text: The registration dossier for recognition of tourist accommodation establishment class does not include?

choices.B: List of relatives of employees in tourist accommodation establishments.
choices.C: Self-assessment of the quality of tourist accommodation establishments according to the provisions of national standards on ranking tourist accommodation establishments.
choices.D: List of managers and employees in tourist accommodation establishments.

text: In what cases can a public service unit unilaterally terminate a labor contract with an employee?

choices.C: Public service units cease operations according to decisions of competent authorities.
choices.D: Officials are on annual leave, personal leave and other leaves permitted by the head of the public service unit.

text: Which of the following does not include the operating principles of the Tourism Development Support Fund?

choices.A: Not for profit purposes; Preserve charter capital and self-cover management costs.
choices.B: Carry out revenue, expenditure, settlement, financial disclosure, assets and accounting work according to the provisions of law.
choices.C: Subject to inspection, inspection and audit by the state management agency in charge of finance and state audit of the financial activities of the Tourism Development Support Fund.
choices.D: The balance of the previous year's funding from the Tourism Development Support Fund can be freely used for personal purposes.

text: Which unit has the authority to establish a film appraisal and classification council?

choices.C: The head of the press agency has a license to operate television

text: What is the purpose of the Film Development Support Fund?

choices.A: Support for experimental film production projects, first films, and films by young authors.
choices.B: Support for authors, film production projects, and excellent Vietnamese films to participate in film festivals, film awards, film competitions, film fairs, film programs, and film weeks abroad.
choices.C: Both A, B, D are correct
choices.D: Support other activities to develop cinema.

text: According to the Tourism Law on state management responsibility for tourism, people's committees at all levels do not have which of the following duties and powers?

choices.B: Taking advantage of tourism activities to bring people from Vietnam abroad or from abroad into Vietnam illegally.
choices.C: Manage tourism resources, tourist areas, tourist attractions, tourism business activities and tour guides in the area;
choices.D: Propagate and raise people's awareness to ensure a friendly, healthy and civilized tourism environment;

text: What is the Referees Association?

choices.B: The Arbitration Association is a social-professional organization of Arbitrators and Arbitration Centers nationwide.
choices.C: The Arbitration Association is a social-professional organization of Procurators and Arbitration Centers nationwide.
choices.D: The Arbitration Association is a social-professional organization of Arbitrators and People's Courts nationwide.

choices.D: All 3 answers A, B, C are correct
